css: body { font-family: 'Yu Gothic', 'Hiragino Kaku Gothic ProN', 'Meiryo', sans-serif; font-size: 7pt; line-height: 1.3; color: #333; } @page { size: A4; margin: 10mm 12mm; } h1 { font-size: 14pt; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 6pt; padding-bottom: 2pt; border-bottom: 1.5px solid #333; } h2 { font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 5pt; font-weight: bold; } h3 { font-size: 9pt; margin-top: 8pt; margin-bottom: 4pt; font-weight: bold; } h4 { font-size: 8pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 3pt; font-weight: bold; } p { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 4pt; } ul, ol { margin-top: 2pt; margin-bottom: 4pt; padding-left: 16px; } li { margin-bottom: 1pt; } table { font-size: 6.5pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-bottom: 6pt; } th, td { padding: 2px 4px; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #f5f5f5; font-weight: bold; } code { font-size: 6.5pt; background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 1px 2px; } strong { font-weight: bold; } hr { margin: 8pt 0; border: none; border-top: 1px solid #ddd; }
